title: Lily Collins Hosts A Night Of Old Hollywood Glamour!
text: Lily Collins Hosts A Night Of Old Hollywood Glamour! Monday, 19 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) Lily Collins shows off her fierce style while attending A Night Of Old Hollywood Glamour at the Waverly Mansion on Saturday (October 17) in Beverly Hills, Calif. The 26-year-old actress co-hosted the event alongside her mother Jill as part of the Los Angeles Conservancy’s ongoing efforts to preserve historic places in Beverly Hills and throughout [...] Lily-Rose Depp looks lovely in lavender while attending the Mademoiselle Prive Exhibition held at the Saatchi Gallery on Monday night (October 12) in London,...
